name: MultiStaticResourceCalloutMock

constructors.name: MultiStaticResourceCalloutMock
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the System.MultiStaticResourceCalloutMock class.

methods.name: setHeader
methods.signature: public Void setHeader(String headerName, String headerValue)
methods.description: Sets the specified header name and value for the fake response.

methods.name: setStaticResource
methods.signature: public Void setStaticResource(String endpoint, String resourceName)
methods.description: Sets the specified static resource corresponding to the endpoint. The static resource contains the response body.

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Sets the specified HTTP status for the response.

methods.name: setStatusCode
methods.description: Sets the specified HTTP status code for the response.

description: Utility class used to specify a fake response using multiple resources for testing HTTP callouts.
